title: The Era of Economic Whiplash Just Beginning
itunes:title: The Era of Economic Whiplash Just Beginning
description:
Bloomberg Opinion Economic Policy and Immigration Columnist Eduardo Porter discusses how the noise from shocks produced by the coronavirus pandemic and Russia’s invasion of Ukraine is rejiggering economic relationships and flummoxing policy makers. Bloomberg News Higher-Education Finance Reporter Janet Lorin explains why the University of Texas’s oil land could make it the richest US School. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Congressional Tax Reporter Laura Davison share the details of Laura's Businessweek Magazine story IRS’s $80 Billion Infusion Means More Audits in 2026 or 2027. And we Drive to the Close with Ken Van Leeuwen, CEO of Van Leeuwen & Company.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Katie Greifeld. Producer: Paul Brennan. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
